channel.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
channel.description:
Since 2002, holiday items, can't be traded, why can't they make them some of them tradable, like the good days, waiting for them to become rare, The items now are just junky, like an untradeable easter egg, what's the point in that??
Of Course, it would take sometime for them to become rare, but that's the whole point in it.
Lets have some opinions.

item.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

The question isn’t why cant they be tradable, the question, why are they so fucking gay, who the hell would want to buy antlers?

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?

item.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

You could dupe in classic and no it did not destroy the economy. In Classic when the items were duped it just dropped the price of 1 item Which is the purple party hat now.

What destroy the economy was the fact that there was so much inflation. Santas went from 200k to 5m in 2 weeks after I started playing. Jagex relised they were putting money into the game but they had no way of taking it out. So that means more people have more money which means the money is worth less. Look at the US economy and compare lol

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?

item.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

That only happened once over a few days/weeks. If there was no rares, then duping such items would not ruin the economy. So yes, the drops did ruin the economy

Read full topic

item.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

they started non tradeable in 2003. I have bunny ears and wish they were tradeable so i could make some good money. They are on my level 81 . He has 700k on him . It would be cool to sell them for 20m . get rich ^^ . but unfortunately it’s not going to happen. And read the holiday items guide or where ever it is on the runecape website. And they made them non tradeable because some pussys were wining that they didnt get any drops because some people just were being greedy (supposely jagex says) and getting to many.

Read full topic
item.source: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?

item.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I guess people have lost the spirit of the Holidays.
Jagex is giving you these as “presents”…you should be happy for them.

Personally I’m happy with them making it so you can’t trade rares.(though I always have wanted a scythe:()
I was able to build a collection of rares from the begging, and seeing the prices go up(before ge) made me happy.

kthx?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

or two weeks sometimes, depends what event it is… when and what you had to do. Most of the rares (I think all) were random gifts from santa the easter bunny etc etc.

item.source: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?

item.title: Why can't christmas / easter items be traded anymore?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

.Kaboom:

Because too many people complained… and they can’t just add a “new” rare… The point of a rare is something unique and not many people have… if you all of a sudden add a new item, people know it will be “rare” in the future, and noone would sell it… etc.

Oh, I guess the item needs to be like 5 years old or something.

Read full topic
